release_note: We re excited to announce a new update for Voice Recorder now fully compatible with iOS 17! Our team is always working hard to ensure your experience is smoother and more reliable. Here s what you can expect in the latest release: iOS 17 compatibility: We ve fine tuned the recorder to ensure seamless performance on the latest iOS versions. Enjoy all the new features and enhancements in iOS 17. Bug Fixes: We ve fixed those pesky bugs that could interfere with your recording experience. Your session should now be more stable than ever. Performance improvements: We ve made under the hood improvements to make the app faster and more responsive. Record play and edit without any delay. Thank you for choosing Voice Recorder for your recording needs. We are constantly striving to make our app better and your feedback plays a vital role in this process. If you enjoy using the app please consider leaving us a review in the App Store. It helped us a lot and we are very grateful. Stay tuned for more updates and happy recording!
Compatible with iOS 17. Bug fixes and improvements. Thank you for using the recorder! We d be really grateful if you could take the time to leave a review in the App Store.

Hi friends! We have updated the recorder to give you a better performance. In today s update we re taking some avant garde pieces to achieve fluid flexibility through improvisation. We also made it fully compatible with the latest iOS. We have localization improvements for Chinese French German Italian Japanese 한국인 Portuguese русский española.
